properties.name: West New York
properties.description: Explore West New York with views of the Hudson River and Manhattan skyline.

properties.name: Rockefeller Center
properties.description: Start your day at Rockefeller Center, an iconic entertainment and shopping complex in Midtown. Duration: 2 hours.

properties.name: Central Park
properties.description: Explore Central Park’s scenic pathways, lakes, and iconic landmarks. Duration: 4 hours. Walking Time: 15 minutes.

properties.name: Roller Rabbit
properties.description: Roller Rabbit Shopping. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: SKIMS NYC Flagship
properties.description: SKIMS NYC Flagship. Walking Time: 25 minutes.

properties.name: Saks Fifth Avenue
properties.description: Check out the holiday displays and upscale shopping at Saks Fifth Avenue. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Radio City Music Hall (Rockettes)
properties.description: Watch the Rockettes at Radio City Music Hall. Duration: 1.5 hours. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: Top of the Rock
properties.description: Visit the Top of the Rock for breathtaking views of New York City at night. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 2 minutes.

properties.name: Rockefeller Christmas Tree
properties.description: Visit the famous Rockefeller Christmas Tree, a must-see during the holiday season. Duration: 30 minutes. Walking Time: 2 minutes.

properties.name: Rockefeller Skating Rink
properties.description: Glide on ice at the Rockefeller Skating Rink, a classic New York winter activity. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 1 minute.

properties.name: Brooklyn Bridge
properties.description: Walk across the historic Brooklyn Bridge and take in stunning views of the city and harbor. Duration: 1.5 hours. Take Ferry from Imperial > Pier 11.

properties.name: Dumbo - Manhattan Bridge View
properties.description: Scenic view of the Manhattan Bridge from Dumbo. Duration: 30 minutes. Walking Time: 15 minutes.

properties.name: Statue of Liberty
properties.description: Visit the Statue of Liberty, one of the most iconic landmarks in the United States. Duration: 3 hours. Walking Time: 30 minutes.

properties.name: Charging Bull
properties.description: Visit the famous Charging Bull statue on Wall Street. Duration: 15 minutes. Walking Time: 20 minutes.

properties.name: Wall Street
properties.description: Take a stroll down Wall Street, the financial hub of the U.S. Duration: 30 minutes. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Federal Hall
properties.description: Visit Federal Hall, a historic building where George Washington was inaugurated. Duration: 30 minutes. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: 9/11 Memorial & Museum
properties.description: Pay your respects and learn about the history of 9/11 at the Memorial and Museum. Duration: 2 hours. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: The Oculus
properties.description: Shop the latest trends at iconic brand names and discover new stores in the Oculus. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Chelsea Market
properties.description: Start your day with food and shopping at Chelsea Market, a famous indoor marketplace. Duration: 1.5 hours.

properties.name: The High Line
properties.description: Walk along the High Line, an elevated park that offers unique views of the city. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: Hudson Yards
properties.description: Explore the new Hudson Yards development, home to luxury shopping, dining, and The Vessel. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: Alo (Shopping)
properties.description: Alo clothes shopping. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: The Edge Observatory
properties.description: Experience breathtaking views from The Edge, an observation deck with a glass floor. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Little Italy
properties.description: Explore Little Italy and enjoy authentic Italian cuisine. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 20 minutes.

properties.name: Chinatown
properties.description: Visit Chinatown for unique shops and delicious Chinese food. Duration: 1.5 hours. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Aire Ancient Baths
properties.description: Relax and unwind at the Aire Ancient Baths spa in Tribeca. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 15 minutes.

properties.name: Empire State Building
properties.description: Head to the top of the Empire State Building for breathtaking panoramic views. Duration: 2 hours.

properties.name: New York Public Library
properties.description: Visit the historic New York Public Library. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Grand Central Station
properties.description: Visit the iconic Grand Central Terminal. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Macy’s
properties.description: Shop at the famous Macy’s in Herald Square. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 15 minutes.

properties.name: Bryant Park
properties.description: Take a stroll through Bryant Park, where you can also visit the Winter Village market. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: Marquis Theatre (Elf)
properties.description: Elf: The Musical! Duration: 2.5 hours. Walking Time: 5 minutes.

properties.name: Times Square
properties.description: End the night with the bright lights and bustling energy of Times Square. Duration: 1 hour. Walking Time: 10 minutes.

properties.name: LGA Airport
properties.description: Conclude your trip by catching your flight at LaGuardia Airport. Duration: 45 minutes to 1 hour (Uber/Lyft).
